title: I need 1 rp for a key, so I drew a key and a chest along with what it will probably give me

embed.description: Post with 3 votes and 15 views. Shared by MachtChete. I need 1 rp for a key, so I drew a key and a chest along with what it will probably give me

> [{quoted}](name=remakoro,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=H8aTnaky,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-08-23T07:11:50.946+0000)
>
> And this is why crit chance should be removed.

I wish I could upvote this twice.
Just upvote it three times and assume two of those upvotes were randomly failed

Not gambling if you have a 100% chance.

Riot's just trying to break your gambling addiction with {{item:3095}} and {{item:3031}}. They're trying their best, okay?
When a chest contains a champ shard it's guaranteed to be worth at least 4800 BE, so you wouldn't get Yi in there, but 90% of the chests I've opened recently have had champ shards.

You get a
{{champion:11}} shard
{{champion:11}} shard
{{champion:11}} shard
270 BE
